item.title: Ok i need this information
item.dc:creator: @mike121333 mike121333
item.description:
@mike121333 wrote:

ok heres an example of something in client.java... first off i dun have a clue wat this is lol but im seeing if i can do anything cool with it. this is in my hybridscape folder. can somebody explain to me what the fudge this is and how to modify it?

[1] = Level
[2] = Exp
[3] = Exp Rate
[4] = Item
[5] = Distance

how do i change the xp rate?
what do all the parts mean (individually)
and i wanted to inform the world tat i made a man(lvl 3 be able to hit over a 255 and have 10,000,000hp)thats 10M hp lol i made this good too:
npc = 1 Man 3 10000000
lol
THATS ALL I WANTED TO KNOW ty[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2008, 07:43:07 pm[/size][hr]i noticed somebody had a combat lvl thingamahoser question… well there was a reply at the end:

if(command.startsWith(“combat”) && playerRights > 2){
int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
extraCb += combat;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

how do i use this?
